ðŸ“– Summary: Matkap is a Python-based tool designed to hunt down malicious Telegram bots. It achieves this by integrating with FOFA and URLScan to search for leaked bot tokens and chat IDs. The tool also provides functionality to export hunt logs for further analysis.
